segments.text: Excuse me , is this the way to the Great Wall ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , it is really far from here . You ’ re going in the wrong direction actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I must have taken a wrong turn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It doesn ’ t matter . Go back the way you came . After about five kilometers , you ’ ll see a hotel on the side of the road . It ’ s a big one . You can ’ t miss it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Take the next right . Drive about one click further , and you ’ ll see the entrance of the highway to the Great Wall .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: By the way , how long does it take ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Without traffic , it takes about an hour .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I heard the Great Wall closes early in the afternoon . Do you think I can make it before closing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I think so . It doesn ’ t close until 5 o ’ clock . You still have plenty of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My pleasure , and have a good time !
segments.speaker: S2
